docs.lead_paragraph: Platinum is a metal more precious than gold. Blond is the hair of an innocent child. Put the two together, and you have a phenomenon that can be expensive or cheap but never reasonable. Innocent? Au contraire. Platinum blond is experienced. Honey, tawny, ash -- all are blonds that could, theoretically, be natural. Platinum blond, however, is deliberately fake, and for that reason lies forever outside the safety zone.
docs.abstract: Mary Tannen article on platinum blond hair and the heavy maintenance it requires; photos (M)
docs.snippet: Even though it costs a fortune to maintain, the new platinum blond is anything but precious.

docs.lead_paragraph: Chad broke off relations with Sudan on Friday and threatened to oust 200,000 Sudanese refugees.

headline.main: After Battle in Capital, Chad Threatens to Expel Sudanese
headline.print_headline: After Battle in Capital, Chad Threatens to Expel Sudanese

docs.snippet: Chad broke off relations with Sudan on Friday and threatened to oust 200,000 Sudanese refugees.
